Articles.Content:
Content warning; If you can't stand part clipping, look away!

So I'm fairly new to this game and I got really addicted to spaceplane SSTO's and I'm making one from scratch now without watching any guide or tutorials or anything, and I want it to be HUGE and able to carry loads of cargo. So far the plane is going to be more than 300 tons, which at least I think is ridicilous. And that's without cargo! I'll take any criticism and advice from guys if you wanna point out anything, anyway here's a  few pics! https://imgur.com/a/s9s0OjZ

I'll update the album as I progress the plane.

I had to double the wings to make it take off the runway, and with these 8 engines it can barely accellerate, but I'll add quite a few extra rapiers and also a bunch of NERVS to be able to get anywhere. 

What's the biggest spaceplane you guys have made? Show me!

Edited November 23, 2018 by Interstellar Yeet
